entry.tran: （介乎两种事物之间的）边缘地带，所属不清的状态
entry.def: The borderland between two things is an area which contains features from both of these things so that it is not possible to say that it belongs to one or the other.

example.ex: ...on the borderland between sleep and waking.

entry.def: The area of land close to the border between two countries or major areas can be called the borderlands .

example.tran: 黎巴嫩的南部边境地区

means.word_mean: 1. district consisting of the area on either side of a border or boundary of a country or an area;

sentences.sentence: "the Welsh marches between England and Wales"
